thread.title: Jose Mourinho confident Zlatan Ibrahimovic will return next season and be a mentor to Man United's young guns
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho confident Zlatan Ibrahimovic will return next season and be a mentor to Man United's young guns

author: David McDonnell
title: Jose Mourinho confident Zlatan Ibrahimovic will return next season and be a mentor to Man United's young guns
text:
Sport Jose Mourinho confident Zlatan Ibrahimovic will return next season and be a mentor to Man United's young guns The Swede has not yet committed to a second season at Old Trafford despite plundering 26 goals this term Share Mourinho wants Zlatan to take the likes of Rashford and Lingard under his wing (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jose Mourinho believes Zlatan Ibrahimovic will be at Manchester United next season – and sees him as crucial to their continued revival. 
Ibrahimovic has the option to extend his contract with United by another year, but has yet to commit himself to the Reds for another season. 
Although Ibrahimovic is 35, he has already scored 26 goals and Mourinho believes he can help United’s group of rising stars become world-class talents under his guidance. 
“I see Zlatan staying with us because that was the initial agreement – for him to come for one year plus us to have the option for a second,” said Mourinho. Ibrahimovic scored twice at Wembley last weekend (Photo: PA) 
“So I see him staying. This team has a lot to grow up, and the next transfer window will bring the team to a different level, because we’re going to try and bring a few players. 
“So I think Zlatan will be fundamental in the second year of this team and I think he’s willing to stay. 
“My feeling is that he’s really proud of himself, he’s happy with the success of his situation, so I see him staying.” 
Mourinho feels youngsters like Marcus Rashford, Paul Pogba, Jesse Lingard, Anthony Martial and Luke Shaw can take their game to a new level by continuing to work alongside Ibrahimovic. 
Ibrahimovic is renowned for his discipline and professionalism, particularly with regard to his fitness, a trait Mourinho is hoping will rub off on his younger players, especially Shaw. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
